title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 platform is using the Class.forName() method, which may cause performance issues or errors.
EB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 platform should be modified to use direct instantiation instead of Class.forName(), to ensure better performance and avoid potential errors.
SR:
To fix this issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
Please test the modified code to verify that it produces the same behavior as before.
